basic.description:
A study of plays and performance in Canada, concentrating on works since the 1960s. Attention will be paid to experiments by companies and individual playwrights. Texts will be read in English.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Canadian Drama

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
